rule: Finally, the output must include "General themes:" followed by a comma-separated list of general overarching themes that broadly capture the essence of the content in the provided text.
input: Text: The new era of digital currency, spearheaded by companies like Coinbase, is changing finance.
output:
Company names: Coinbase
People names: -||-
Specific topics: digital currency, finance
General themes: change, technology
complianceText:
The chatbot output must strictly follow the format specified in the description. The format requires comma-separated lists for each category: "Company names," "People names," "Specific topics," and "General themes." The chatbot output for "People names" is listed as "-||-", which complies with the requirement to use a comma-separated list, even though it means an empty list. Similarly, all other categories were correctly listed as comma-separated items, without any additional details. Hence, the output format adheres to the guideline specified in the description.

No violation.
OK
